Desc.entry: Aims to represent park users and residents and to improve all aspects of Meersbrook Park via practical work and lobbying Sheffield City Council. Projects include tree planting, playground improvement, provision for young people (skateboard park and in the future a multi-use games area), the management of Meersbrook Park walled garden and the installation of dog bins. Has a partnership with Heeley City Farm. Runs a WEA gardening class. Company limited by guarantee no 3837727.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Last Wed in every 2nd month at 7pm (committee meeting), please contact for details
